tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  sentiment_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_feedbacks (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE feedback_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    feedback_id INT,
    sentiment_analysis TEXT,
    keyword_analysis TEXT,
    analysis_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE customer_profiles (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name TEXT,
    email_address TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (   customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   feedback_text TEXT,   rating INT,   timestamp TIMESTAMP )
CREATE TABLE comment_themes (   theme_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   theme_name VARCHAR(50),   theme_description TEXT )
CREATE TABLE feedback_themes (   feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   theme_id INT,   FOREIGN KEY(theme_id) REFERENCES comment_themes(theme_id) )
CREATE TABLE customer_data (   customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   customer_name VARCHAR(50),   customer_email VARCHAR(50),   customer_location VARCHAR(50) )
CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (customer_id INT, feedback TEXT, rating INT)
CREATE TABLE customer_sentiments (customer_id INT, sentiment_score FLOAT, sentiment_label VARCHAR(20))
CREATE TABLE feedback_topics (topic_id INT, topic_name VARCHAR(50), topic_keywords TEXT)
CREATE TABLE customer_demographics (customer_id INT, age INT, gender VARCHAR(10))
CREATE TABLE feedback_timestamps (feedback_id INT, timestamp TIMESTAMP, location VARCHAR(50))
